caption: Relating to requiring a person to submit proof of citizenship to register to vote; creating criminal offenses.
authors: Hughes, Bettencourt, Birdwell, Campbell, Creighton, Flores, Hagenbuch, Hall, Hancock, Hinojosa, Adam, Huffman, King, Kolkhorst, Middleton, Nichols, Parker, Paxton, Perry, Schwertner, Sparks
